document_data.name: Reverse Time
document_data.mainbody: '''''Repeat time''''' was a [[divine magic]] spell available to [[priest]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell stopped time in an area with {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} diameter centered around the caster. Everything within this area became motionless. Creatures or objects that entered this area while the spell was in effect also became frozen in time. The spell reversed time up to a certain point determined by the caster then froze.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], an etched arrow made from [[silver]] that was bent into a circle. The arrow could be longer than {{SI|3|in|c|long=yes}} nor cost more than 500 [[gp]].
document_data.History: This spell was inscribed within the [[Kelemvor]]ite [[relic]] the ''[[Testament of Vraer]]''.
